testcase.name: Automate End to End Buy Order functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Techlistic Login page......................................passed When User clicks on sign in providing Username and Password.................passed Then the Homepage is displayed..............................................passed When User clicks on T-Shirts submenu under Womens menu......................passed Then the T-Shirts list page is displayed....................................passed When User clicks on More button on 1st T-Shirt..............................passed Then the customize product page is displayed................................passed When User adds T-Shirt by customizing and clicks on checkout................passed Then the Checkout page is displayed.........................................passed When User Checkout the T-Shirt by confirming................................passed Then the order Confirmation message is displayed............................passed

testcase.name: Verify that 'Add to Cart' .
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Index Page.................................................passed When User clicks on T-Shirts submenu under Womens menu in Index Page........passed Then the T-Shirts list page is displayed....................................passed When User clicks on Add to Cart button on 1st T-Shirt.......................passed And User clicks on Proceed to Checkout......................................passed Then the Checkout page is displayed.........................................passed When User clicks on Proceed to checkout in Summary tab......................passed Then User should see Sign in tab............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify that 'Add to WishList' only works after login.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Index Page.................................................passed When User clicks on T-Shirts submenu under Womens menu in Index Page........passed Then the T-Shirts list page is displayed....................................passed When User clicks on Add to WishList Link on 1st T-Shirt.....................passed Then User should see Add to WishList Error Message..........................passed
